scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher wading through a body of water, carrying the Christ Child on his shoulders. Saint Christopher is shown from the waist up, with his legs submerged in the blue water, holding a long staff to steady himself. He wears a golden tunic and a red cloak draped over his shoulders. The Christ Child, depicted as a small figure with a halo, is seated on Saint Christopher's shoulders, holding a golden orb and with hands clasped in prayer. The background is a bright blue sky, with hints of green and blue landscape elements on either side, suggesting a natural, outdoor setting. The entire scene is framed by an ornate, gilded architectural border.
